EmailTemplate.description: Used for an automated email which is generated when the "Project Status" changes to "DesignStudio Project Transferred to Customer" AND dropdown under "Design Services Sales Order" (Project Information section) is set to "Obtained"
EmailTemplate.name: Illumina Services Project : Depending On Project Status And Design Sales Order
EmailTemplate.subject: Regarding Concierge Project Request {!Illumina_Services_Project__c.Name}
